name: cradle-video-automation
description: Browser extension for automating Cradle video comparison workflow
author: Hubert Rycaj

scripts.build: npm run copy-manifest && npm run zip-extension
scripts.dev: echo 'Load extension/manifest.json in Chrome Developer Mode'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting JavaScript files...' && find extension -name '*.js' -exec node -c {} \;
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: echo 'Manual testing required - load extension in browser'
